Factsheet

Developer:
Cheeky Stork
Release date:
2025
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
www.cheekystork.com

Description

"Manners Be Damned!" is a couch co-op party game in which you and up to 7 friends will compete in platforming challenges set in an ancient, deadly temple. The only tools you’ll have are your fancy canes - great for pushing each other into trouble! But don’t worry! Death is cheap - so play it fast and loose to try and get any advantage. Earn points for your speed, agility and cane wielding mastery to prove you are the best gentleman!

History

The idea for "Manners Be Damned!" was born in early 2024 as part of the "Global Game Jam" here in Lithuania. The prototype hooked us, so we decided to turn it into a full game. After three short months we had a brand new demo and an invitation to participate in "Comic Con Baltics" to showcase our game to the public properly for the first time. The feedback was overwhelmingly positive and we've been improving on it ever since. The game is still in active development.

Features

  • Local co-op for up to 8 players (online play available with Steam Remote Play Together)
  • 2 distinct game modes ("King of the Hat" and "Temple Dash")
  • Hilarious player interactions
  • 100% voice-recorded SFX
  • Accessible for all ages and skill levels

About Cheeky Stork

Boilerplate
Based in Vilnius, Lithuania, we’re a tight-knit team of friends and equal-part founders of Cheeky Stork. We’re green, but learning fast – each of us wears a bunch of hats and all of the work is done in-house. We’ve always been fascinated by games that tie in new, experimental mechanics with traditional gameplay systems, and so our goal is to deliver those kinds of unique experiences with our games as well.
